summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the redesigned flight search results UI. Verified all required elements including left sidebar filters, sort tabs, column headers, flight cards with airline logos, route codes, baggage info, stops, times, duration, prices, green 'Seç' buttons, and expandable 'Detay' sections. All interactive functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: Homepage loads successfully and search form with From/To dropdowns works
Search functionality works (Bakı -> İstanbul selection and search execution)
Search results section appears after clicking search with proper layout
Left sidebar contains all required elements:
- 'Aramayı Favorilere Ekle' button present and functional
- 'Fiyat Alarmı oluştur' button with green border styling
- 'Filtrele' section with all required filters:
- Aktarma (with Aktarmasız, 1 Aktarma, 2+ Aktarma options)
- Bagaj filter section
- Bilet fiyatı filter section
- Kalkış / varış saatleri filter section
- Uçuş süresi filter section
- Havayolları filter (with airline checkboxes)
- Havalimanları filter (with airport selections)
Sort tabs functioning correctly:
- 'En ucuz' selected by default with dark blue background (#1a3c5e)
- 'En hızlı' clickable and changes selection state
- 'Daha fazla' option available with slider icon
Column headers visible and properly labeled:
- HAVAYOLU, UÇUŞ DETAYI, KALKIŞ, FİYAT headers present
Flight cards display correctly (8 results found):
- Airline names with colored circular logos containing plane icons
- Route codes showing path (e.g., BAK > DXB > IST)
- Baggage information with luggage icons (e.g., '1x30 kg')
- Stop information (red '1 Aktarma', '2 Aktarma' or green 'Direkt Uçuş')
- Departure and arrival times (e.g., 20:29 - 01:35)
- Flight duration display (e.g., '6sa 33dk')
- Price display in Turkish Lira with proper formatting
- Green 'Seç' buttons (10 total found) with hover effects and right arrow
Direct flight features working:
- Blue 'Direkt uçun, zaman kazanın!' banner for direct flights
- 'Business Class' and 'Direkt Uçuş' tags visible
Interactive elements functioning:
- 'Detay' links expand and collapse flight details correctly
- 'Seç' buttons are clickable (tested first button successfully)
- Sort by 'En hızlı' reorders flights and updates tab selection
- Close (X) button dismisses search results
Responsive design elements verified:
- Grid layout implementation for flight cards
- Proper spacing and alignment of all elements
